text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
My dream, is to become a true Mile Queen! 
Once more, I'm looking forward to working with you!

——The other day, I signed a provisional 
contract with the Uma Musume, Gran Alegria.

Apparently, my actions yesterday happened to fit 
her "MiRules" when it came to choosing a trainer.

I figured I should at least get to know her a little, 
so I was asking her a few questions……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Right. Thanks for the drink earlier. 
Its deliciousness was 100 Miles～♪

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
So, Trainer-san, just how much do you love Miles? 
I could say that my love for Miles is infinite!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Miles are the absolute best, so it's only natural to love them!
……In any case, it seemed she was an Uma Musume that loved Miles.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
My Mama, in the past, used to run in America's 
mile races. I've been watching her videos since 
I was little……and that's why I admire them.

text_block_list.name: Gran's Mom
text_block_list.text:
『Aaah, Miles really are the best! A pure contest 
of strength, it's the most wonderful distance』

text_block_list.name: Gran's Mom
text_block_list.text:
『Maybe you don't realize it, but definitely 
someday you'll know! That Miles are the best!』

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ——It was just like Mama said!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
If you don't have the speed then you can't compete, 
and of course you need stamina too.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Speed is a really important inborn talent right? But that's why 
not necessarily everyone can take on short distance races.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Taking advantage of your speed and using it to 
fight over longer distances……if that isn't 
the greatest, then what do you think could be!?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
From the start, since I started running in juvenile 
races, until now…… I've never lost in a Mile!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Miles are the best. In other words, since I've never lost in 
that kind of race……that means I'm the best of the best!

Gran Alegria was speaking enthusiastically. She was influenced by 
her own mother, but it seemed that passion for Miles was real.
choice_data_list: So that's why a Mile Queen?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! But not just any Queen! 
A "True" Mile Queen!

Gran Alegria, with her eyes sparkling, ran on to the 
training grounds. But she soon turned and looked this way——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Short, Mile, Medium…… 
0.75 Mile, or 1.25 Mile, it doesn't matter.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
I can win. I have the legs for that. A win at every 
distance, something that no one has accomplished so far.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Miles are the greatest. 
As a future Mile Queen, so that I can prove it——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I will conquer all three distances!
She spread out her arms as she shouted her dream.

Winning in all three distances……my eyes widened in surprise. 
Thinking that I had misheard, I asked her again——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: That's right! I'll tell you something else, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Actually, before I came to Tracen Academy, there was a trainer 
that I wanted to train me, so I tried asking them first.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
So you're here again today, Gran? 
You really are someone who won't give up.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Of course! In an interview, you said 『An Uma Musume who 
has conquered all three distances is the true Mile King』!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Even if I become the next Mile Queen that won't prove 
that Miles are the best. Your words were an inspiration!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
That's why, I wanted the one who showed me the way to 
prove that they're the best to become my trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text: That's not possible.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: But why not!?

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I've told you before……you have talent. And that's why you 
need a trainer who will chase that dream together with you.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Now, I'm in charge of many Uma Musume. 
So I can't walk that path together with you.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Try finding one yourself. In the truest sense, one who will 
chase that dream together with you. That kind of trainer.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: And that's how he turned me down.
choice_data_list: In the truest sense, together with you……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. But, for some reason～, I think I know what he meant. 
I can't really put it in to words though……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
But well, in the end it worked out. 
Because with these special MiRules, I was able to find you!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ——That's why, Trainer-san

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Can you see the same dream that I can!?
